issue.title: [Java] Open a document to track the API changes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5998](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5998). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We need a document to track the API behavior changes, so as not forget about them for the next release.

comments.body:
